at.fhooe.mc.conconii

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhooe.mc.conconii.Observable
      • at.fhooe.mc.conconii.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends Observable
    The DataManager must be used to get data from any sensor. This class is implemented as Singleton and it's main job is to provide and store data. In addition to this core tasks the manager also stores the list of measurement points. The manager as a broadcast receiver gets each intent and decides which data was received and stores some data until a new intent is received.
    Author:
    Robsen & Gix
